trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Murrysville
There were no other sightings in Murrysville on or around June 2nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsThe object appeared in a blue space of sky between clouds travelling from the East heading West. It went behind wispy clouds and never reappeared. It was travelling very fast. Much faster than a jet. I have not seen this type of object before. About 2-3 seconds later a jet (unknown type) appeared travelling from the North toward the South in the same area.
